column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This review is for Lou's mail ordering abilities. 5 stars all the way and I will continue to treat family with Lou's because of Lou's 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed reputation! I have family that can't always get to the brick and mortar restaurants
column2: so we depend on being able to order through the mail. The last time I ordered
column3: the USPS had to get this precious Lou Malnati's pizza order all the way to Washington state
column4: across a Ferry and to a pretty remote island. Thanks Lou Malnati's for making this possible!
